name: SkullKnightmon Cavalier Mode
effect: The name of this card/Digimon is also treated as [SkullKnightmon] and [DeadlyAxemon].[When Digivolving] This Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon) and ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead) until the end of your opponent's next turn.
